decision_conditions: The Reasonable Exception Statement submitted by the applicant has insufficient detail provided to satisfy the LPA that a Fire Safety Startegy is not required or that the proposed development would accord with Policy D12 of the London Plan 2021 and as such the details do not satisfy the requirements of condition 7 of 23/01657/HOU.
description: Details required for Condition 7 (Fire Safety) of planning permission 23/01657/HOU (Erection of first floor rear extensions with pitched roofs, new rear canopy to rear elevation, alterations to side fenestration, existing solar panels re-located to rear roof slope)
application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
